name: interlocal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between different organizations that each serve or are responsible for a small area: interlocal cooperation Local governments across the region have signed an interlocal agreement to reduce nitrogen pollution. Related word
local
More examplesFewer examplesThe state law allows interlocal agreements among police departments.Interlocal agreements enable some officers to work for several towns.The joint lottery is conducted according to regulations set out in an interlocal cooperation agreement. The county and school district have an inter-local agreement about the siting of new schools.
